text: @GOP @realDonaldTrump @Mike_Pence Shameless hypocritical abomination of an Administration, we know Trump called the Coronavirus a Democratic hoax, blamed the Obama Administration defunded the CDC & fired the White House global pandemic task force a while back leaving this Country in a state of emergency.
